plugins.prepareCmd: sed -i 's/^version = .*/version = "${nextRelease.version}"/' pyproject.toml && sed -i 's/^version = .*/version = "${nextRelease.version}"/' apps/bridge/pyproject.toml && node -e "['package.json','apps/web/package.json'].forEach(f=>{const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8'));p.version='${nextRelease.version}';fs.writeFileSync(f,JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');});" && uv lock && git add package.json pyproject.toml apps/bridge/pyproject.toml apps/web/package.json uv.lock
